name: Sans Logique
description:
Sans Logique is a puzzle/adventure game set in a strange, fantastical world. Through the eyes of a mysterious character, you'll have to solve riddles to find your way out, venturing ever deeper into this world mixing dream and reality. You'll have to find your way out of this labyrinth, first with your hands and then with the help of various objects that will give you powers.

Puzzles

Solve a variety of original riddles to unravel the mysteries of Sans Logique and understand your story.

Exploration

Travel through strange portals and discover the different dream worlds inhabited by strange beings that make up Sans Logique.

Infiltration

Escape your fears, the shadows, those terrible monsters that roam the caves, by adopting the strategy that suits you.

Interactions

Use the various powers you'll find along the way to solve puzzles and advance through the game.
